help:
**Wx Bot – Weather Help**

Get the current weather for any city, region, or ZIP/postal code.

**Command**  
`/weather <location> [units]`

**Parameters**  
• `<location>` – Name of a city (e.g. London), region (e.g. CA), or postal code (e.g. 90210). Required.
• `[units]` – Optional. Temperature units: Fahrenheit (F) or Celsius (C).

**Automated Reports**  
Operators can configure automated reports by specifying `channel_id`(s), location(s), and a cron schedule in the config files.

**Examples**  
```md
/weather Tokyo
/weather New York
/weather 10001
/weather Paris C
/weather "San Francisco" F
```
